title: Goodyear 2 In 1 Window Squeegee Flexible Rubber Blade| Netted Sponge Scrubber| Multi-purpose And Easy To Use| Non - Scratch| Ideal For Cleaning Windows And Windscreens| Compact Design, Easy Storage
availability_text: Only 6 left in stock (more on the way).
features: Dual-Functionality for Maximum Efficiency: The Goodyear 2 In 1 Window Squeegee is designed with a flexible rubber blade and a netted sponge scrubber, providing a versatile cleaning tool that effortlessly tackles tough dirt and grime. This multi-purpose squeegee is ideal for both windows and windscreens, ensuring a streak-free and spotless finish every time.

Non-Scratch Technology for Delicate Surfaces: Protect your surfaces with the Goodyear 2 In 1 Window Squeegee's non-scratch design. The soft yet durable rubber blade and gentle netted sponge ensure that even the most delicate glass surfaces are cleaned without leaving scratches or marks.

Highly Absorbent Netted Sponge for Effective Scrubbing: The netted sponge scrubber is designed to absorb plenty of water and cleaning solution, making it highly effective at breaking down and removing stubborn dirt, bugs, and road grime. This sponge provides excellent scrubbing power, ensuring your windows and windscreens remain crystal clear.

Flexible Rubber Blade for Streak-Free Results: The Goodyear 2 In 1 Window Squeegee features a flexible rubber blade that easily conforms to the surface of your windows or windscreen, ensuring a thorough wipe with no streaks left behind. This blade glides smoothly across the surface, providing a flawless finish every time you clean.

Compact and Ergonomic Design for Easy Handling: This squeegee's compact design makes it easy to store in your car, garage, or cleaning supplies cabinet. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, allowing for precise control during use. Its lightweight construction ensures fatigue-free cleaning, even during extended use.
description: Introducing the Goodyear 2-In-1 Window Squeegee, the ultimate tool for achieving spotless, streak-free windows and windscreens. Equipped with a flexible rubber blade, this squeegee effortlessly glides across surfaces, removing water and debris in one swift motion. The blade's non-scratch design ensures that your windows remain pristine, without any risk of damage. The netted sponge scrubber on the other side of the squeegee adds versatility to this essential tool. Designed to tackle tough grime and dirt, the scrubber works hand-in-hand with the squeegee blade to provide a thorough clean. The netted material ensures efficient scrubbing without leaving any scratches behind, making it perfect for delicate surfaces. With its multi-purpose design, the Window Squeegee is more than just a cleaning tool—it's a versatile helper around the house and car. Use it to clean your bathroom mirrors, shower doors, and tiles, or keep it in your car for quick and easy windscreen cleaning. The compact size and lightweight construction make it easy to handle and maneuver, ensuring that even hard-to-reach areas are within your grasp. Designed for easy storage, this squeegee's compact design allows it to fit neatly into any storage space. The ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip, making your cleaning tasks more manageable and less tiring. The Window Squeegee is engineered for durability, built to withstand repeated use without compromising performance. The high-quality materials ensure that the squeegee remains effective and reliable, providing you with long-lasting cleaning power.
